pages.title: Fast Food
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 2 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Killing animals will nourish you instead of dropping items.

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Exceeding nourishment is stored and granted when required.
